team11.core.schema

Class ShootingSchema

  • java.lang.Object
    • team11.core.schema.ShootingSchema
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Schema

    public class ShootingSchema
extends java.lang.Object
implements Schema
    Provides a general shooting schema to use when firing birds in the Angry Birds game.
    Author:
    Chris N. Hartley (cnhartle@calpoly.edu)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void shoot(java.util.List<Shot> shotList)
      Shoots the specified List of type Shots based on their values for the starting point, (x, y), change in X and Y coordinates to the drag to point, specified by (dx, dy), and the times to release and tap, if applicable.
      void shoot(Shot singleShot)
      Shoots the specified Shot based on its values for the starting point, (x, y), change in X and Y coordinates to the drag to point, specified by (dx, dy), and the times to release and tap, if applicable.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • shoot

        public final void shoot(java.util.List<Shot> shotList)
        Shoots the specified List of type Shots based on their values for the starting point, (x, y), change in X and Y coordinates to the drag to point, specified by (dx, dy), and the times to release and tap, if applicable.
        Parameters:
        shotList - the List<Shot> for all shots to be fired.
        See Also:
        Shot

      • shoot

        public final void shoot(Shot singleShot)
        Shoots the specified Shot based on its values for the starting point, (x, y), change in X and Y coordinates to the drag to point, specified by (dx, dy), and the times to release and tap, if applicable.
        Parameters:
        singleShot - the Shot to be fired.
        See Also:
        Shot
